author: kpedro88
body:
As discussed a few days ago, this type of production-like workflow will be used in the future for Phase 2 performance profiling as an (optional) part of PR tests. @slava77 @fabiocos 

Details:
1. Remove DQM and validation steps from RECO part of workflow.
2. Put PAT step into separate miniAOD part of workflow.
3. HARVEST part of workflow is removed (condition added to `MatrixReader` to skip steps that are `None`).
4. Workflows are forwarded to the standard matrix for D35 ttbar, 0PU and 200PU (classic mixing): 27434.21, 27634.21

Setting this up for premixing might be more difficult... @makortel
title: Introduce production-like matrix workflow for Phase 2 performance profiling
